attributes.action: Theresa May Save The NHS Not Everyone Get Privet Health Care Through Work!!
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is at crisis point, people are waiting longer for referrals, causing people to suffer in pain on a daily basis, causing more unnecessary deaths due to the lack of staff and beds. Start putting money into the NHS, we are not all lucky to have private health care as part of our jobs... Help save more life's Theresa May and help end the suffering!
attributes.background: Put some more money in the NHS pot Theresa May, stop people living in pain and unnecessary deaths!
